ActionBar_NewFolderCmd.Title: New Bookmark
ActionBar_NewFolderCmd.LongHelp:
Select bookmark section and click this command to create a root bookmark.

Select an existing bookmark in the tree and click this command to create a bookmark under the selected bookmark.
RemoveContent.Title: Remove
RemoveContent.ShortHelp: Removes the selected content from the bookmark.
RemoveContent.LongHelp: From the bookmark, select one or more objects and click this command to remove the selected content.
AddExistingContent.Title: Add Existing Content
AddExistingContent.LongHelp:
Click this command and enter a query in the dialog box to search for the required content.

Select the required content and click OK to add the content to the selected bookmark.
AddToFavorites.Title: Add/Remove Favorites Bookmark
AddToFavorites.ShortHelp: Adds or removes bookmarks categorized as favorite.
AddToFavorites.LongHelp:
Select a bookmark in the tree section and click this command to add the bookmark as favorite.

From the favorites or the bookmark section, select a bookmark marked as favorite and click this command to remove it from favorites.
Cut.Title: Cut
Cut.ShortHelp: Cuts the selected content in the bookmark.
Copy.Title: Copy
Copy.ShortHelp: Copies the selected content in the bookmark.
Paste.Title: Paste
Paste.ShortHelp: Pastes the copied or cut content in the bookmark.
UPSReplaceByLatestRevision.Title: Replace By Latest Revision
UPSReplaceByLatestRevision.ShortHelp: Replaces the selected content by its latest Revision.
UPSReplaceByLatestRevision.LongHelp: Select one or more objects in the content view in the bookmark and click the command to replace the selected content by its latest revision.
UPSAuthReplaceByRevision.Title: Replace By Revision
UPSAuthReplaceByRevision.ShortHelp: Replaces the selected content by one of its revisions.
UPSAuthReplaceByRevision.LongHelp: Select a content in content view in the bookmark and click this command. From the Replace By Revision panel, select the required revision to replace the selected content in the content view by its revision.
AddFile.Title: Upload
AddFile.ShortHelp: Uploads a file to the selected Bookmark.
AddFile.LongHelp: Click the command, select single or multiple files and click OK in the dialog box to upload the files in the bookmark.
DownloadFile.Title: Download
DownloadFile.LongHelp: Select the Document(s) and launch this command to download containing files of the selected Document(s).
EditFile.Title: Edit
EditFile.LongHelp: Select a document and click this command to download file and lock it for modification.
UpdateFile.Title: Update
UpdateFile.LongHelp: Select the document and click this command to update modification done in a file.
UndoEditFile.Title: Undo Edit
UndoEditFile.ShortHelp: Cancels Edit in a selected file
UndoEditFile.LongHelp: Select the document Which is currently being Edited and click this command to undo/cancel edit of the file.
FolderUpload.Title: Folder Upload
FolderUpload.ShortHelp: Creates Bookmark structure from selected file system folder.
FolderUpload.LongHelp: Select file system folder to create Bookmark structure out of it.
FolderDownload.Title: Bookmark Download
FolderDownload.ShortHelp: Downloading folder structure containing Documents as an archive file.
FolderDownload.LongHelp: Select Bookmark to download it as 'File system' folder structure containing Documents only. Folder structure downloads as an archive file.
ActionBar_ShareBookmarkLink.Title: Copy Link
ActionBar_ShareBookmarkLink.ShortHelp: Copy the bookmark link to the clipboard.
ActionBar_ShareBookmarkLink.LongHelp:
The command will copy the bookmark link to the clipboard and allow you to share it with others.

Please note that access to the bookmark requires that your recipient has a 3DPassport, license and appropriate credentials.
ActionBar_Attributes.Title: Edit Properties
ActionBar_Attributes.LongHelp: Edits the properties of the selected object.
ActionBar_FindInCtxCmd.Title: Find in Context
ActionBar_FindInCtxCmd.ShortHelp: Find the objects connected to the bookmark or in a physical product.
ActionBar_FindInCtxCmd.LongHelp: Click on the command, enter the query and perform find to find the objects connected to the bookmark or in a physical product.
ExportCSV.Title: Export
ExportCSV.ShortHelp: Exports the contents of the bookmark as a CSV file.
ExportCSV.LongHelp: To select the columns you want to export, open the Tree List View Options.
ImportCSVBookmark.Title: Import Bookmark
ImportCSVBookmark.LongHelp: Click on this command, select appropriate csv and click on OK to import the bookmark structure
thumbnailview.Title: Thumbnail View
treeview.Title: Tree View
tileview.Title: Tile View
ActiveFolder.Title: Set/Unset Global Default Bookmark
ActiveFolder.ShortHelp: Set or unset the Global Default Bookmark
ActiveFolder.LongHelp: Click to define the Global Default Bookmark for all commands supporting this functionality.
